messages.title: Change with the Lib Dems
messages.content: Ryan Mercer and the Lib Dems will fight hard Brexit and protect our place in the Single Market. The Lib Dems will be the strong opposition the country needs. Ryan will fight for the rights of EU nationals to stay.

messages.title: The Conservative Plan for Britain
messages.content: The Conservative party is now the party of extreme hard Brexit. Theresa May is determined to pull Britain out of the single market and cut all ties with our neighbours.

messages.title: Only the Lib Dems are fighting to stop hard Brexit
messages.content: The Conservative Government is dragging the country towards a hard Brexit that will be disastrous for the future of Britain. The General Election on June 8th is your opportunity to stop them by electing a Lib Dem MP here in Putney, Southfields and Roehampton.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ryan Mercer and the Lib Dems will fight hard Brexit and protect our place in the Single Market.
Ryan will fight for the rights of EU nationals to stay.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The local Liberal Democrats have more than doubled in size to over 1,200 since last year’s referendum in response to a hard Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: The General Election on June 8th is your opportunity to stop Conservatives by electing a Lib Dem MP here in Putney, Southfields and Roehampton. Only the Liberal Democrats are united in opposing hard Brexit.
issues.government: Lib Dem leader Tim Farron said: 'This is our chance to send the Government a clear message that we do not want a hard Brexit. If you want Britain to remain in the single market there is only one option in this election - back the Liberal Democrats.'
issues.health: Our NHS and local schools face huge cuts, piling pressure on already stretched services.
issues.immigration: Our Conservative MP voted against guaranteeing 10,000 EU nationals in Putney the right to stay.

quotes.text: Justine Greening, the education secretary, is one of the cabinet ministers most at risk on June 8. Putney boasted the second highest Remain vote in the EU referendum, rendering it at risk of a Lib Dem surge.
[Lib Dems are] the anti Brexit, Remain party. So for all those Remain voters still unreconciled to the outcome of the referendum, they are the obvious choice to go for.

examples: The local Liberal Democrats have more than doubled in size to over 1,200 since last year’s referendum in response to a hard Brexit.
Our Conservative MP voted against guaranteeing 10,000 EU nationals in Putney the right to stay.
Ryan Mercer and the Lib Dems will fight hard Brexit and protect our place in the Single Market.
Lib Dem leader Tim Farron said: 'This is our chance to send the Government a clear message that we do not want a hard Brexit.'
'The Conservative Government is dragging the country towards a hard Brexit that will be disastrous for the future of Britain.'
The Conservative party is now the party of extreme hard Brexit. Theresa May is determined to pull Britain out of the single market and cut all ties with our neighbours.
Our Conservative MP voted against guaranteeing 10,000 EU nationals in Putney the right to stay.
Our NHS and local schools face huge cuts, piling pressure on already stretched services.
The Conservative Government is dragging the country towards a hard Brexit that will be disastrous for the future of Britain.
